title: Mobile-Based Practical Training Program for Strengthening Healthcare Infection Control Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A mobile-based medical education course enabling asynchronous learning in smartphone-centric limited technological environments. Focuses on enhancing infection control practical skills through project-based tasks for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can write analytical documents on real clinical cases using infection control materials provided via mobile platforms.
Learners can collaborate with peers using mobile tools (e.g., Telegram) to design and implement infection prevention projects.
Learners can achieve an 80% or higher accuracy rate in infection control diagnostic assessments at the end of the course.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
